mapper.select: select m.id, m.info, m.movie_id, w.name as movie_name, m.website_id, w.name as website_name, m.url, m.publish_date from movie_detail m left join website w on m.website_id = w.id order by m.publish_date desc

select m.id, m.info, m.movie_id, w.name as movie_name, m.website_id, w.name as website_name, w.url as website_url, m.url, m.publish_date from movie_detail m left join website w on m.website_id = w.id where m.movie_id = #{movieId}

select m.id, m.info, m.movie_id, w.name as movie_name, m.website_id, w.name as website_name, w.url as website_url, m.url, m.publish_date from movie_detail m left join website w on m.website_id = w.id
and info like concat('%', #{info}, '%')

select count(1) from movie_detail
and info like concat('%', #{info}, '%')

select m.id, m.info, m.movie_id, w.name as movie_name, m.website_id, w.name as website_name, w.url as website_url, m.url, m.publish_date from movie_detail m left join website w on m.website_id = w.id where w.id = #{websiteId}
